name: ぼくは人狼になりたい
name_original: ぼくは人狼になりたい
description:
"I Want to Be a Werewolf" is a text-based adventure where you can enjoy the detective elements of the Werewolf game and the stories of the characters.
Players proceed with the story by looking at the arguments of the participants and selecting the people to be eliminated and the reasons for doing so.

A serious young man, Shirai wakes up in a strange room.

Without hesitation, he is ordered to participate in the "werewolf game" by a person on the monitor.

Six men and women, similarly assembled, were waiting for me as I left the room.

Where the hell is this place?

why should i play the game?

What is the identity of the game master?

The announcement of the start of the game is played without an answer.

What is the "werewolf game"?
Participants are divided into two camps, villagers and werewolves.
Villager participants do not know who the werewolves are. Therefore, we will discuss and vote, and remove one human who seems to be a werewolf from the game every term. If you repeat this process and eliminate all the werewolves, you win.
The werewolves can forcibly eliminate one human villager per term. Repeat this process until the number of remaining werewolves equals or exceeds the number of villagers to win.
The above are the basic rules, but the detailed rules may change due to the participation of special positions.


The game progresses by selecting the person you want to banish and the reason for it at the appropriate time.


Let's guess who is a werewolf by checking each person's remarks and voting results.※notice
Due to various circumstances, all in-game images using AI have been replaced.
I am very sorry for those who were fascinated by the graphics when I first reported it and were looking forward to it.
I hope you can understand.
